Articles.Content: Do you think man will go to mars?
Man will definitely go to mars, but I don't think it will be mars one who puts them there.
Already a lengthy discussion in here : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47036-space-Is-Mars-one-a-scam

Man will go to Mars. Yes.

Mars One? Maybe. Based on the video, though, with KSP in the background... well, let's hope they remember to scale correctly!

Mars one is probably gonna fall short of the amount of money they want. But once NASA rolls out Orion and the SLS we might get a Mars fly-by. Mars One is a very optimistic idea. Someone should colonize the moons North pole instead.
